title: Coronavirus: Hong Kong tourism, elderly care sectors urge further easing of pandemic rules; bookings open for toddler version of BioNTech jab
description: City will also open bookings for toddler version of BioNTech vaccine, to be available at four centres citywide.
dc:creator: Chris Lau,Cannix Yau
author: Chris Lau,Cannix Yau
